ftbquests.chapter.chapter_ii_the_brass_m: Chapter III: The Precision Machine[--第三章:精密机器--]
You have Water, you have Sugar, you have Sand, you have Quartz, it’s time to mix it up! [--你有水,有糖,有沙子,有石英,是时候把它搅拌起来了!--]
Use a &6Mechanical Mixer&r and a &6Basin&r, to mix all the ingredients to get a &bSmall Certus Quartz Bud!&r God that’s a mouthful name.[--使用&6动力搅拌器&r和&6Basin&r来混合所有原料来获得&b小型赛特斯石英芽!&r神是口齿不言之名.--]
With the small version, you pour water on it using a &6Spout&r. You have to pour water 3 times on the &bSmall Certus Quartz Bud.&r[--有了小版本,你就会用&6蒸馏&r向它倒水.你必须在&b小型赛特斯石英芽&r上倒3次水.&r--]
With the medium version, you pour water on it using a &6Spout.&r You have to pour water 3 times on the &bMedium Certus Quartz.&r[--有了中级版本,你就会用&6蒸馏&r将水倒在上面,你必须在&b中赛特斯石英&r上倒3次--]
With the large version, you pour water on it using a &6Spout.&r You have to pour water 3 times on the &bLarge Certus Quartz.&r[--有了大版本,你就会用&6蒸馏&r将水倒在上面,你必须在&b大赛特斯石英&r上倒3次--]
With the Certus Quartz Cluster, you don’t pour water on it, this time you crush it either using the &6Crushing Wheels&r or the &6Millstone.&r[--使用赛特斯石英簇,你不会给它倒水,这次你使用&6粉碎轮&r或&6石膏&r粉碎它--]
Pour Destabilized Redstone with a Spout onto a Certus Quartz Crystal 3 times to turn it into a Rose Quartz.[--将石英石英粉碎成玫瑰石英,将石英注入赛特斯石英水晶3次。--]
With the Redstone Dust and Nether Wart you’ve collected. Put them inside a basing on top of a Blaze Burner and mix them up with a Mechanical Mixer.[--用你收集的红石粉和下界疣。把它们放入烈焰人燃烧室顶部的基座中,然后用动力搅拌器将它们搅拌。--]
You can find &4redstone&r by mining deep in the earth.[--你可以通过在大地深处挖矿来找到&4红石&r.--]
There are recipes to automate the process of getting &4Redstone Dust&r. By washing Crushed Raw Iron.[--有配方可以自动化获得&4红石粉&r.通过洗涤粉碎原铁.--]
Here’s a trivia for you for a start![--这是你的一个开始!--]
Sugar can save your life! When poured in a wound, the sugar granules will soak up the moisture that allows the bacteria to thrive. [--糖可以让你活命!当糖粒被倒入一个外壳时,糖粒会浸润出允许细菌生长的湿度.--]
Without the bacteria, the wound heals more. In some parts of the world, this procedure can save the lives of people who cannot afford antibiotics.[--没有菌丝,伤害会治愈更多。在世界上的某些地方,这个程序可以拯救无法承受抗生素的人的生命。--]
Now for game facts, you can get&6 sugar&r by cultivating&a Sugar Canes&r or some honey from the bees.[--现在对于游戏现实,你可以通过种植&a甘蔗&r或蜜蜂获得&6甘蔗&r.--]
The famous &bWater Bucket!&r It can save your life! [--命名的&b水桶!&r它可以救命!--]
Always carry a &bWater bucket&r with you so when you jump from a high place, if you time it well, you can place the Water to dampen your fall. [--总是随身携带一个&b水桶&r,所以当你从高处跳跃时,如果你时间好,你可以放置水来抑制摔落.--]
That’s your Pro tip for the day![--这是你一天的工作提示!--]
&aNote:&r &oYou probably already know how to get a Water Bucket by now.&r[--&a注意:&r&o你现在可能已经知道如何得到水桶了.&r--]
You probably already know how to get some Sand by now.[--你可能已经知道如何得到一些沙子了。--]

Time to assemble! You have two ways to do this, you can either use a Deployer holding a &6Polished Quartz Rose&r and place it into an Iron Sheet or you can use Mechanical Crafts for something more fancy looking.[--是时候组装了!你有两个方法可以做这个,你可以使用手持&6磨制石英玫瑰&r并将其放入铁薄板中,也可以使用动力合成来达到更精致的外观。--]

With the Soul Sand in hand, you can now wash it’s sins by using a&6 Encased Fan&r and Water blowing against the Soul Sand and you’ll get&c Nether Quartz&r in return as well a chance of getting a Gold Nugget.[--手持灵魂沙后,你现在可以通过使用&6灌注风扇&r和水对着灵魂沙吹灭来洗净它的邪恶,你将获得&c下界石英&r以及获得金粒的几率.--]
You can also mine &cNether Quartz&r in the Nether.[--你也可以在下界开采&c下界石英&r.--]

Time to polish the &cRose Quartz.&r To do so you have to use&6 Sand Paper&r, you can either do it by hand or with a Deployer in an automated way. [--是时候给&c甘蔗石英&r磨粉了。&r要这样做,你必须使用&6砂纸&r,你可以手动或用机械手自动完成.--]
There are various types of &6Sand Paper&r with different durability.[--有各种&6沙子&r的耐久性不同.--]
&6&lTip:&r&r &oYou can use a Seething Sail as a permanent solution for your polishing automations.&r[--&6&l提p:&r&r &o你可以使用幻影风帆作为打磨自动化的永久解决方案.&r--]

To get Brass Ingots you have to mix both&6 Zinc Ingots&r and &6Copper Ingots&r. To do so you need a Basin on top of a Blaze Burner and a Mechanical Mixer.[--要获得黄铜锭,你必须同时混合&6锌锭&r和&6铜锭&r。要这样做,你需要在烈焰人燃烧室和动力搅拌器上有一个盆子。--]
You probably already know how to get some&d copper ingots&r by now.[--你可能已经知道如何得到一些&d铜锭&r了.--]
You can get&9 Raw Zinc&r from mining and to turn it into an ingot you have to smelter it. [--你可以从采矿中获得&9原锌&r,然后把它变成一个你必须冶炼它的锭.--]
You can use an Encased Fan and Lava for an automated process or use a Seething Sail with an Encased Fan.[--你可以使用灌注风扇和熔岩来自动处理,也可以使用灌注风扇的注星帆。--]
Please check &nRenewable Ores chapter&r for information on how to get a renewable source of &9Raw Zinc&r.[--请查看&n可更新矿石章节&r了解如何获得&9Raw Zinc&r的再生源头.--]
Grab your Brass Ingots, place it under a Mechanical Press and start flat lining them to make some Brass Sheets.[--抓住黄铜锭,将其放在动力冲压机下,开始平整内衬,制作一些黄铜片。--]

The &cNether Wart&r can be found in the Nether or you can farm like you farm wheat. Instead of dirt you need to plant the &cNether Wart&r in &6Soul Sand&r and the &rNether Wart&r doesn’t need light to grow.[--&c下界疣&r可以在下界找到,或者你可以像种植小麦一样耕种。你需要泥土而不是在&6灵魂沙&r中种植&c下界疣&r,而&r下界疣&r不需要光来生长.--]
With the Soulless Sand you’ve just made, grab yourself a Soul from the shelf and stick it up the Soulless Sand! [--用你刚刚制作的没有灵魂的沙子,从书架里捡一个灵魂,把它粘在没有灵魂的沙子上!--]

To create&6 Soul Sand&r you must use a &cDeployer&r to put a &3Soul Bead&r or&3 Ethereal Spirit&r  into the Soulless Sand, turning it into Soul Sand.[--要创建&6灵魂沙&r,你必须使用&c动力棒&r将&3灵魂珠&r或&3虚弱之魂&r放入灵魂沙中,将其变成灵魂沙.--]
The Soul Bead drops from Wraiths. The Wraiths can be found wandering around in the Nether in the Soul Sand Valleys.[--灵魂珠从幽灵中掉落。幽灵可以在灵魂沙峡谷的下界游荡。--]
&l&2Note:&r&r &oIn the next chapter you’ll learn how to automate monster drops.&r[--&l&2注意:&r&r&o在下章节中你会学习如何使怪物掉落物自动化.&r--]
Sand without a Soul, which begs the question, does Sand contain a Soul? Spoiler alert! It does, in the Nether. [--没有灵魂的沙子,它会请求问题,沙子是否包含灵魂?沙子会警告你吗?在下界!--]
To obtain the Soulless Sand you have to curse the Sand, not verbally though, you use a &bhaunted flame&r. [--要获得没有灵魂的沙子,你必须诅咒沙子,而不是言语,你使用了&b恶魂火焰&r.--]

You can use a Soul Campfire or set a Soul Sand on fire with a Flint and Stone or use a Haunting Sail, with an Encased Fan blowing air against a Sand block which will turn it into a Soulless Sand.[--你可以使用灵魂营火或用石和石来点燃灵魂沙,也可以用鼓风机对着沙子吹气,将其变成灵魂沙子。--]
The Ethereal Spirit drops from a variety of monsters that lurk during the night that spawn randomly around the world or structures. [--天域灵灵从各种怪物身上掉落,这些怪物在夜间潜行,随机生成于世界或结构。--]
&l&2Note:&r&r &oIn the next chapter you’ll learn how to automate monster drops.&r[--&l&2注意:&r&r&o在下章节中你会学习如何使怪物掉落物自动化.&r--]
The heart of all &6Brass Machines!&r [--所有&6黄铜机器的心脏!&r--]
You can craft the &aPrecision Mechanism&r by using Deployers, a Mechanical Press and a Valve Mechanism. [--你可以使用机械手、动力冲压机和阀门机来制作&a精密装置&r.--]

The first Deployer assembles Brass Sheets into the Valve Mechanism, then the second Deployer assembles the Electron Tube, then the last Deployer assembles the Cog Wheel and finally the Mechanical Press does the final touch and you have made the &6Precision Mechanism!&r[--第一个机械手将黄铜片装入阀门,然后第二个机械手装入电子管,然后最后一个机械手组装齿轮,最后动力冲压机做最后的触摸,你已经制作了&6精密装置!&r--]
&aNote:&r &oIt has a 85% success rate and a 15% chance of giving a random item.[--&a注意:&r&o它有85%的成败率和15%的几率随机给予物品.--]
Remember when you flattened the Copper Ingots? Well do the same for the Iron.[--记得你平整铜锭的时候吗?对铁也这样。--]
Use a &6Mechanical Press&r to flatten the Iron Ingots into Iron Sheets.[--使用&6动力冲压机&r将铁锭平整成铁片.--]
With all your knowledge and hard work combined, you’ve achieved the ultimate goal of&c Chapter 3!&r The creation of the &aPrecision Machine!&r[--&c第3章!&r 创建&a精密机器!&r--]
This will evolve your automation farms to a whole new level of automation and precision! You should pat yourself in the back, you deserve it. [--这将将你的自动化农场升级到新的自动化和精准水平!你应该给自己拍拍背,你值得它。--]

Congratulations on getting this far,you’ve mastered the basics of Create, you know how to use the JEI  function so from now on &9you’re on your own! &r[--恭喜你到了这个地步,你已经掌握了创造的基础,你知道如何使用JEI功能,从现在起,&9你只能自己了!&r--]

The challenges that await you on &lChapter 4 and beyond are harder&r than what you had to do so far but don’t lose hope! I know you can master all chapters, believe in me (the writer) as I believe in you! [--在&l第4章和以后等待你的挑战比之前你必须做的更难&r,但不要失去希望!我知道,你可以掌握所有章节,信我(作者),因为我相信你!--]

I know you’ll miss me, but don’t worry! I’ll still be here to help you with certain mechanics in the next chapters but mostly you’re on your own. Good luck![--我知道你会想我的,但不要操心!我还是会在这里帮助你在下一个章节里处理某些机械师,但大多数情况下你都是你自己的。祝好运!--]
&6&lTip:&r&r &oIf you feel like you’re running out of certain materials, make sure to check the Chapter Renewable Ores.&r[--&6&l提p:&r&r&o如果你觉得你正在消耗某些材料,请确保查看可更新矿石章节.&r--]
&6Tom's Simple Storage[--&6Tom的简单存储--]

Do you end up with a gazillion chests and not know which chest you put the item that you need for your next build? Then you’ll love this &6Tom's Simple Storage&r, as it makes storing and finding your items much easier![--你是否拿着一个gazillion箱子,不知道你把下一个建造所需的物品放在哪个箱子里?然后你会喜欢这个&6Tom的简单存储&r,因为它让你的物品更容易存储和找到!--]
&nHow it works:&r[--&n如何工作:&r--]

&2Step 1:&r  First, you place down a block called the Inventory Connector. This is like a better brain than yours. It knows where everything is kept. Then you either place a Storage Terminal or a Crafting Terminal on the Inventory Connector to access the chests contents. Make sure to use Shift when doing so.[--&2第1步:&r首先,你放下一个叫“物品栏连接器”的方块。这就像一个比你的更好的大脑。它知道所有东西都保留在哪里。然后,你在物品栏连接器上放一个存储终端或合成终端以访问箱子内容。确保这样做时使用Shift。--]

&2Step 2:&r You can place a chest on either side of the Inventory Connector and it will read its contents. You can even stack the chests on top of each other and the Inventory Connector will still read their contents as long as one chest is touching the Inventory Connector.[--&2第2步:&r你可以在物品栏连接器的两侧放置一个箱子,它会读取其中的内容。你甚至可以将箱子堆叠在彼此的顶部,只要一个箱子触摸到物品栏连接器,物品栏连接器仍然会读取它们的内容.--]

&2Step 3:&r If you have Chests that are in a further location, you can use an item called Inventory Cable Connector against the chest, make sure to use Shift to do so and then you use another item called Inventory Cable to make a connection from the Cable Connector to the Inventory Connector to read the chests contents even though it’s further away.[--&2第3步:&r如果你有箱子在另一个地方,你可以对箱子使用一个叫做库存线缆连接器的物品,确保使用Shift来这样做,然后使用另一个叫做库存线缆的物品从线缆连接器连接器到存储连接器来读取箱子内容,即使它距离更远.--]
Note: It also works with Item Vaults[--注意:它也适用于物品保险库--]
That’s just the basics on how this mod works. It has many more features for you to discover![--这只是这个mod如何工作的基础。它有更多的功能需要你发现!--]

You know how to craft one… Fine… For consistency's sake… Grab a Shaft, grab a Wood Plank and either use a Deployer to place the Wood Plank on a Shaft, or a Mechanical Mixer with a Basin to mix both or use the trusty Crafting Table to make the Cog Wheel. [--你知道如何制作一个... 好吧...为了untlearnity's...craft a shift,抓一个木板,然后使用机械手将木板放在传动杆上,或者使用动力搅拌机将两个混合,或者使用信任工作台来制作齿轮.--]

&cBuilding Gadgets&r mod allows you to create some cool gadgets to help you build big bases, or for clearing out large areas using the &dDestruction Gadget.&r[--&c建筑小帮手&rmod允许你制作一些很酷的小帮手来帮助你建造大基座,或者使用&d破坏小帮手来清除大区域.&r--]
&6&lNote:&r&r &oTo charge this Gadget you must use a Tesla Coil and have eletricity. &r[--&6&lNote:&r&r&o为这个小帮手充电,你必须使用Tesla线圈并具有电子化.&r--]
